Title: Relates to authorizing the commissioner of the department of transportation to enroll New York state in any federal pilot program or project for the collection and study of various roadway and transportation data
Summary: Relates to authorizing the commissioner of the department of transportation to enroll New York state in any federal pilot program or project for the collection and study of state roadway safety, infrastructure sustainability, congestion mitigation, transportation system efficiency, autonomous vehicle technology, or capacity challenges.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the transportation law, in relation to authorizing the commissioner of the department of transportation to enroll New York state in any federal pilot program or project for the collection and study of various roadway and transportation data
